definitions.definition: An offensive action in which an attacking force moves over or around the enemy and attacks from the rear; see also pincer movement .
An action to seize the opponent's blade in one line and lead it (without losing contact) through a full circle to end in the same line.

secondary_definitions: ( military ) An offensive action in which an attacking force moves over or around the enemy and attacks from the rear; see also pincer movement .
( fencing ) An action to seize the opponent's blade in one line and lead it (without losing contact) through a full circle to end in the same line.
